directions: Combine zucchini, onion, avocado, garbanzo beans, apple cider vinegar, jalapeno pepper, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper together in a bowl; chill in refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and coarsely chopped
1/4 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste
title: Zucchini Gazpacho
